title: Just a remake of 'Cannibal Holocaust (1979)'
review: I was very disapointed when I watched this move because I saw it before, when it was called Cannibal Holocaust (1979). I am sure they took the idea there and thought that nobody will ever know because Cannibal Holocaust is a pretty old italian movie.Take a look by yourselfThe movie: http://us.imdb.com/Title?0078935The plot : http://us.imdb.com/Plot?0078935
